Text:
"In the first episode, Bear Grylls tackles the perils of suburbia in Bear Grylls Suburban Survivor.

David Attenborough examines the fascinating behaviour of Frankie Boyle in Stand Up Planet, and Danny Dyer deals with one of the toughest things on earth - the commute to work.

We witness Jonathan Ross, Russell Brand and David Walliams join forces as superheroes in a comic book fantasy, meet an anti-bullying Gordon Ramsay and discover how Adele struggles to make herself understood."

http://www.channel4.com/programmes/very-important-people/episode-guide/series-1/episode-1

really big thanks for this TvTeam :):)

Classification: Scripted
Genre: Celebrities | Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)

Very Important People is a comedy impression series starring Morgana Robinson and Terry Mynott. The series mocks many different celebrities and satirises a culture bamboozled by trivia, gossip and regurgitated ideas.
